snippet: Nike withdrew its offer to sponsor the American pole-vaulter Brad Walker after he placed tape over the company’s logo, which he said he did to make sure that a Velcro strap on his shoe stayed tight.
abstract: Nike withdraws its offer to sponsor American pole-vaulter Brad Walker after he places tape over company’s logo, which he says he did to make sure that a Velcro strap on his shoe stayed tight.
lead_paragraph: Nike withdrew its offer to sponsor the American pole-vaulter Brad Walker after he placed tape over the company’s logo, which he said he did to make sure that a Velcro strap on his shoe stayed tight.

headline.main: No Nike Deal for Pole-Vaulter After He Puts Tape Over Logo
headline.print_headline: No Nike Deal for Vaulter After He Puts Tape on Logo
